data.title: ▷ TNA Wrestling More Greatest Shows Now on TrillerTV+
data.meta_description: News: TrillerTV announces the addition of twenty classic, must-see-again-and-again, events from TNA Wrestling’s glorious history to TrillerTV+
data.text:
To celebrate the triumphant return of the TNA name 20 more of the best shows ever are being released as part of your TrillerTV+ subscription; Two events a week will be added, kicking off with a Hard to Kill double header and continuing with epic matches from Kenny Omega, Samoa Joe, Jeff Jarrett, Kurt Angle, Sting and more

New York, NY (January 8, 2024)--TrillerTV formerly known as FITE, today announced the addition of twenty classic, must-see-again-and-again, events from TNA Wrestling's glorious history to TrillerTV+, the best value in streaming sports. Due to popular demand in reaction to the 20th anniversary archive release late last year, more great events have been broken out of the vaults to celebrate the promotion's name change back to TNA Wrestling (after being known as Impact since 2017). The action on TrillerTV+ launched with 2 amazing, complete Hard to Kill events from 2020 and 2021 – to help prime fans for the Hard to Kill 2024 PPV on January 13th– and the TNA mayhem follows with two new events released every Thursday for ten weeks.

Sign up for TrillerTV+ now and be ready for TNA's classics

Hard to Kill 2021 is especially notable with Kenny Omega having just won the AEW World title, teamed with The Good Brothers to face Rich Swann, Chris Sabin and Moose in a 6-man tag. The coming weeks will bring important Impact Plus, Homecoming, Victory Road, Hard and Hardcore Justice, TNA Genesis, Final Resolution, Destination X, and more events going all the way back to the beginning in 2004. Watch out for the likes of Raven vs. Abyss in a dog collar match, Americas Most Wanted vs Triple X in six sides of steel, the TNA & IWGP World Title Match between Kurt Angle & Samoa Joe, Jeff Jarrett vs. Monty Brown for the TNA World Title, and Bobby Roode vs. AJ Styles in a 30-minute iron man match for the TNA Championship.

All this exciting TrillerTV+ action joins exclusive wrestling action from Major League Wrestling, Game Changer Wrestling , Wrestling Revolver, Insane Championship Wrestling as well as archival shows from New Japan Pro Wrestling. The subscription also includes Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship events, other leading boxing, MMA and grappling promotions, and in select regions, AFC Champions League and Liga Portugal soccer. The subscription also offers unlimited on-demand access to the entire TrillerTV+ library with over 4000 hours from more than 100 organizations from around the world.

Sign up for the TrillerTV+ 7-Day free trial now..

For more information about TrillerTV contact owen.phillips@fite.tv

About TrillerTV:

TrillerTV is the premium global platform for live sports and entertainment offering many of the industry's marquee PPV events to 8M registered users. Additionally, TrillerTV offers exclusive subscription packages such as AEW Plus in select regions, and TrillerTV+, the best value in sports, worldwide. Consumers can stream TrillerTV globally through its iOS and Android mobile apps, Apple TV, Android TV, ROKU and Amazon Fire TV apps. In addition, TrillerTV supports Samsung, LG, Cox Contour, Vizio SmartCast™, Virgin Media, Shaw Communications, Blue Curve IPTV, Foxxum, Chromecast, XBOX, ZEASN, Netrange, Vidaa/Hisense, VEWD/ TiVO, Netgem TV, Comcast's Xfinity 1 and Xfinity Flex, as well as more than 7,000 models of Smart TVs. TrillerTV also offers a free ad-supported FAST channel called TrillerTV 24/7, both on and off platform. Visit TrillerTV online at www.TrillerTV.com. Follow us as TrillerTV powered by FITE on Twitter/X, Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIN, Facebook, and Threads.
